reviews.author: Sandy Zh
reviews.text: Wonderful place to come with friends and family. Lovely atmosphere and wonderful service. Food is delicious! Thank you to Bota who made sure we had a great time and everything we needed! Loved everything about our evening at Lova Coffee!

reviews.author: Klara Bakyt
reviews.text: The environment is very good, the service attitude is good, the food is delicious, recommended!!!

reviews.author: Glebbbbbbbb Bbbbbbbbelg
reviews.text: Leila made sure that we have everything we needed and did her best! We liked everything that we ordered!

reviews.author: Claire Sutton
reviews.text: I have just tried this restaurant and was very disappointed. First i order a small orange juice. They didnt have it, but insteaad of informing me this they decideed to bring me a large jug of lemonade with mint which i dont like. I ended up having water as no other cold drinks were actually available. I ordered chicken with spinach from the menu. There was no mention of mushroom in this dish. When the food arrived it was basically small chicken and spinach with a plate full of mushrooms. I dont

reviews.author: üá®üá¶Najib MEKKIüáµüá∏üá≤üá¶
reviews.text:
The waitress took away my full glass of lemonade while I was talking with my wife without my noticing it!
When I complained, they apologized and said that they will replace it, but instead, to my great SHOCK, they. only brought me a THIRD of a glass of lemonade!
Can you believe it? 
Not only are they SUPER CHEAP but they actually  stole my glass of lemonade, which I, of course, paid for!
